title: How to sort Extensions on Sidebar
content:
Love the Sidebar, however:

1. How to sort the items on Sidebar? There are so many things, such as the Bookmarks, History, and Extensions, how can I sort them? It seems that I cannot simply click and drag to rearrange them.

2. Too many Extensions on Sidebar. Give us the option to show or hide some of the Extensions.

Good feature but very... unprofessional, especially compared to Sidebar of Opera.

title: Video stops playing when closing picture-in-picture player

creator: kudanzuijin

title: Discord not playing videos
content: The Discord website does not play embedded video files (mov, mp4, etc). This is an issue specific to Firefox, and is not present in other browsers such as Chrome. This issue is only for video files and not embeds from sites such as Youtube or Twitter/X. Furthermore, when downloading these videos, they play solely the audio and not the video part of it. This is not an issue with any other downloaded video. I have tried clearing my cache and restarting Firefox, as well as disabling my extensions. None of which has worked.
creator: pranavanand2468

title: firefox updates reset my settings
content:
every time firefox does these automatic updates in the background, it resets certain security settings that cause me anger and frustration.

example: is that I access all my secure sites via Lastpass... and the latest update has killed that ability and I need now to go down into the bowels of the firefox settings to figure out how to get Last pass functionality working again...it is a huge time waster and frustrating when I need to use this immediately.

any advice for me before I give up firefox and revert to using a Chrome browser again?
creator: doug.loggie

title: Sync tabs
content: I sync tabs with multiple devices, but I cannot get my tabs to sync with my iPad. I have tried scanning the QR code from my desktop browser. I have tried entering the password. The process never finishes on the iPad, even after the desktop browser said the process was complete.

title: I can't tell if I'm crazy, or if the tab area shrank
content:
I think the new update shrank the space above the tabs. When I try to find solutions, all I find are chrome users complaining about the space and ways to shrink it. However, I want that space back. Or, I'm just losing my mind and having to remove the new sidebar just completely threw me off.
